headline: CenterPoint Energy Q2 Earnings Miss Estimates, Revenues Improve Y/Y
summary: CNP's Q2 earnings fell short of estimates on higher financing costs, but revenues rose 2% year over year to $1.94 billion.

headline: CenterPoint Energy (CNP) Q2 Earnings Lag Estimates
summary: CenterPoint (CNP) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -14.71% and +0.27%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: CenterPoint Energy reports solid Q2 2025 results; reiterates 2025 full year guidance; increases 10-year capital investment plan by $500MM
summary: HOUSTON, July 24, 2025--CenterPoint Energy, Inc. (NYSE: CNP) or "CenterPoint" today reported net income of $198 million, or $0.30 per diluted share on a GAAP basis for the second quarter of 2025, compared to $0.36 per diluted share in the comparable period of 2024.
